name: Return (maxine)
description:
"Return" is an text-based horror game about coming home. I recommend you play it on a laptop/desktop with your audio on. Mobile should (in theory) work but it'll look worse and the sounds might not play. 

(also please only play on wifi i think some of the uncompressed audio might eat up all of your data)

content warnings: startling noises, some gore here and there, strained family dynamics. 

credits

"UI, Mechanical, Text-Scroll, 03, FX, 01, LOOP.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
